Articles.Content:
We'll need a mod where you start in the Real Solar System and if you go to a portal that is inside at a random planet from the solar system, like CHaron, you could access the Mohole and get teleported to Kerbol SYstem.

Edited September 10, 2020 by Relonsk
KSP2 will have mods, it's already confirmed (I'm pretty sure)
KSP2 will be moddable. Whether it has any mods depends on whether it attracts any modders.
